snippet: Young illegal immigrants who qualify for President Obama’s deportation deferral program will be eligible to obtain a driver’s license in California.
abstract: Young illegal immigrants who qualify for Pres Obama's deportation deferral program will be eligible to obtain a driver's license in California.
lead_paragraph: Young illegal immigrants who qualify for President Obama’s deportation deferral program will be eligible to obtain a driver’s license in California.

headline.main: California: Young Immigrants Eligible for Driver’s Licenses
headline.print_headline: California: Young Immigrants Eligible For Driver’s Licenses
